```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library("tidyverse")
library("stringr") # string tools
library("RCurl")
library("rvest")# web scraping
library("lettercase") # fiddle with letter case

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

##  Read in files

City of Houston has tables of street names and zip codes. Read these in
to a tibble for later work.


```{r read in files}

# initialize empty data frame

streets <- tibble(Name=character(),
                  Zip=character()
                  )

for (letter in LETTERS) {
    url = paste("http://www.gims.houstontx.gov/scps2/address/intersecting/htmlBackup/street_",letter,".html", sep="")
    print(url)
    if (! url.exists(url)) {
      print("============================== no such url")
      {next}
    }
    
  tempfile <- url %>% 
    read_html() %>% 
    html_nodes(xpath='/html/body/table') %>% 
    html_table(header=TRUE)
    
  tempfile <- tempfile[[1]]
  
  # append to streets
  
  streets <- bind_rows(streets, tempfile)
}

```
